name: Hardened North PVE 0.7.1
description:
The main purpose of this mod to make Volcano and Mounds of the Dead great again.
So have been added wolves and spider to these zones.
Volcano now is 60 lvl zone

Change notes:
Created new NPC Lava Spider
Added:
Wolves to Mounds of Dead
Lava Spiders to Volcano
Human NPCs in Volcano now have better armor and weapon
Added 2 new named female fighters 4. Daicas have been changed to female (it's usual surgery so it can be possible in Conan world as well :) ) with random apearance.(just for new thralls) 
Spinas has random apearance as well
Increased hp, damage and armor for all votaries NPC
Slightly increased hp for any t3 and t4 votaries thralls
Added swapn points for random fighters (this will increase a bit chanse to find T4)
Added spawn point for dancer

Affected files:
I was trying to keep changes in independent files, but needed to amend maps files

05.04 Fixed bug with HP for T4 warrior thralls.
